Weapon.Name: Starshard Staff
Weapon.Description: A luminous staff, studded with fragments of fallen stars. It hums with celestial energy.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The staff releases a blast of starfire that engulfs the enemy.

Weapon.Name: Elonim's Grit
Weapon.Description: The soil of Elonim, hardened and compressed into a deadly sling projectile. It's said to carry the weight of the entire homeland.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The sling stone hits with a force beyond its size, staggering the enemy.

Weapon.Name: Harmony Flute
Weapon.Description: A carved bone flute. Its song stirs the spirit, restoring strength and resolve.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: A soothing melody fills the air, revitalizing all who hear it.
